multiple_choice_question.text: What type of avalanche is depicted in Figure 1?
What is the primary cause of the crown cracks observed in Figure 2?
choices: Low tensile rupture stress of wet snow

multiple_choice_question.text: What type of failure mechanism is illustrated in Figure 3?
choices: Tensile failure at the crown and shear failure on the sides
Compressive failure at the crown and tensile failure on the sides
Shear failure at the crown and compressive failure on the sides
Tensile failure throughout the entire snowpack

multiple_choice_question.text: According to Formula (4), which of the following would make a full-depth avalanche *less* likely to release?
